body:
When u join AV Nebula, what server is playable all the time? Throwback. As for me, it is boring to play same maps every day.
I suggest to make random map rotation or mix maps from different servers.
body_tagged:

title: Map rotation

replies.body:
This is what the Mix and DTM servers are for.
Whether people play on Throwback or not is there choice.

replies.body:
But u need some players to start game there. And what about minority choice?
Al this is very sad

replies.body: I somewhat agree however modifying or editing the rotation and the maps themselves will ruin the point of the server, its supposed to be throwback.

replies.body: Disperse the maps on Throwback into the other rots. Throwback is overplayed.
